name: Akai Kaidan
storyline: Tomoe, a Japanese schoolgirl, finds herself trapped in a mysterious, dark basement of her school auditorium storage facility with her 2 schoolmates. She soon realizes that the three of them are not the only ones present in the basement... Tomoe must find her way out of the basement before the terrifying, red "something" gets her!
summary:
You are trapped in a mysterious, dark basement of your school auditorium. You must find your way back out before a terrifying, red "thing" grabs you!!

(This game contains jump scares, blood, dead people, and other horror elements that may not be suitable for young children.)
